entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
